info.name: BakaBT Dark and Purple
info.description: A dark, kawaii theme for BakaBT. I tried to maintain the site's happy, pink theme in this dark style by using purple. Commented sections, so you can easily change it.
info.additionalInfo:
Post any errors here, or on the BakaBT forums. Inspired by Dusk Maiden of Amnesia--specifically this picture: http://i.ytimg.com/vi/2Pfwpddq-LU/maxresdefault.jpg

Changelog:
2015-08-01:
Matched BBC code and the Sandbox to match style.
Added iframe .infobox black background.
Removed redundancies.
